name: Endless Runner Audio Game
description:
You are running down a suburban street, and your goal is to run as far as possible. You need to jump over construction cones and slide under road signs. The character will be running on its own, so you only need to focus on avoiding the obstacles. To tell the obstacles apart and time your actions you need to listen to the sounds.

This is an early release of BlindingVibes' first audio game. The game is under development and we would appreciate it if you would give us feedback, and fill out our survey: 

https://forms.gle/KzKD2RVcJgf6xNyT8 (English)
https://forms.gle/WucHqMKKK9L9ixqM6 (Danish)
